com.terremark.config
Class PropertiesBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.terremark.config.PropertiesBuilder

public class PropertiesBuilder
extends Object

Properties necessary to instantiate Terremark client. Most of the property use appropriate default values. At a minimum setEndPoint(String), setAccessKey(String) and setPrivateKey(String) should be set.

Author:
Seshu Pasam
See Also:
TerremarkFactory.getClient(PropertiesBuilder)

Field Detail

ENDPOINT_URL

public static final String ENDPOINT_URL
Default Terremark eCloud API end point URL

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

PropertiesBuilder

public PropertiesBuilder()
Default constructor. Sets the context type to ContentType.XML, signature algorithm to SignatureAlgorithm.HMAC_SHA256 and API version to Version.VERSION_2_12. API end point URL is set to the default value (https://services.enterprisecloud.terremark.com/cloudapi/ecloud).

Method Detail

build

public final com.terremark.impl.ClientConfiguration build()
                                                   throws MalformedURLException
Used internally to retrieve the configuration set by the user. Validates the arguments and throws IllegalArgumentException if the arguments are invalid or missing.

Returns:
Client configuration.
Throws:
MalformedURLException - If the API end point URL is invalid.

setEndPoint

public final PropertiesBuilder setEndPoint(String uri)
Set the API end point URL. This is required property.

Parameters:
uri - API end point URL.
Returns:
The builder object reference.

setProxyHost

public final PropertiesBuilder setProxyHost(String proxyHost)
Set the proxy host (name or IP address) to use, when connecting to the API end point. This is optional property.

Parameters:
proxyHost - Proxy host (name or IP address).
Returns:
The builder object reference.
See Also:
setProxyPort(int)

setProxyPort

public final PropertiesBuilder setProxyPort(int proxyPort)
Set the proxy port to use, when connecting to the API end point. This is optional property, but required if proxy host is set.

Parameters:
proxyPort - Proxy port number.
Returns:
The builder object reference.
See Also:
setProxyHost(String)

setAccessKey

public final PropertiesBuilder setAccessKey(String accessKey)
Set the access key for performing the Cloud API authentication. This is required, if Cloud API authentication should be used. Either this or user name are required.

Parameters:
accessKey - Access key for Cloud API authentication.
Returns:
The builder object reference.
See Also:
setPrivateKey(String), setUserName(String)

setPrivateKey

public final PropertiesBuilder setPrivateKey(String privateKey)
Set the private key for performing the Cloud API authentication. This is required, if the access key is set.

Parameters:
privateKey - Private key for Cloud API authentication.
Returns:
The builder object reference.
See Also:
setAccessKey(String)

setContentType

public final PropertiesBuilder setContentType(ContentType contentType)
Set the content type to use. Currently only ContentType.XML is valid. This is optional and defaults to ContentType.XML.

Parameters:
contentType - Content type to use.
Returns:
The builder object reference.
See Also:
ContentType

setSignatureAlgorithm

public final PropertiesBuilder setSignatureAlgorithm(SignatureAlgorithm signatureAlgorithm)
Signature algorithm to use when Cloud API authentication is configured. This is optional and defaults to SignatureAlgorithm.HMAC_SHA256. This is not applicable when basic user name/password authentication is used.

Parameters:
signatureAlgorithm - Signature algorithm to use.
Returns:
The builder object reference.

setHttpClient

public final PropertiesBuilder setHttpClient(org.apache.http.client.HttpClient httpClient)
Apache HttpClient to use for connecting to the API end point. It is recommended to configure connection pooling on the client. This is required.

Parameters:
httpClient - HttpClient to use for connecting to the API end point.
Returns:
The builder object reference.

setRetryHandler

public final PropertiesBuilder setRetryHandler(RetryHandler retryHandler)
Retry handler to use for determining if failed GET calls should be retried. Only HTTP GET calls can be retried. This handler will not be invoked for other types of HTTP requests (POST, PUT, DELETE). This is optional. If not specified, HTTP GET calls that fail with 500+ error codes will not be retried.

Parameters:
retryHandler - Retry handler.
Returns:
The builder object reference.

setUserName

public final PropertiesBuilder setUserName(String userName)
Set the user name to use for performing basic authentication. This is not recommended authentication method. Instead Cloud API authentication should be used.

Parameters:
userName - User name for basic authentication.
Returns:
The builder object reference.
See Also:
setAccessKey(String), setPassword(String)

setPassword

public final PropertiesBuilder setPassword(String password)
Set the user password for performing basic authentication. This is not recommended authentication method. Instead Cloud API authentication should be used.

Parameters:
password - Password for basic authentication.
Returns:
The builder object reference.
See Also:
setUserName(String)

setAPIVersion

public final PropertiesBuilder setAPIVersion(Version version)
Set the API version to use. This is optional. If not specified, Version.VERSION_2_12 will be used.

Parameters:
version - API version to use.
Returns:
The builder object reference.
See Also:
Version
